# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(GMV_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(GMV)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
GMVPluginInfo.C
GMVCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
GMVPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
GMVMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGMVFileFormat.C
gmvread.c
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
GMVEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtGMVFileFormat.C
gmvMaterialEncoder.C
gmvread.c
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/databases/PDB
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IGMVDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IGMVDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IGMVDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MGMVDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MGMVDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MGMVDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MGMVDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EGMVDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGMVDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EGMVDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGMVDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EGMVDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EGMVDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EGMVDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EGMVDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases GMV ${INSTALLTARGETS})
